name: Product Catalog – Catalog for WordPress
author: OriginCode

sections.description:
Useful:

  • Home Page
  • Demos
  • Support Forum
  • Contact US

Time to explore the best Product Catalog plugin. Make sure you learn all the advantages that you will get with the product catalog plugin before uploading it to your WordPress website.

The product catalog plugin is made for demonstration, sale, advertisements for your products. In fact you are able to create your own online store for your wordpress website with our product catalog.

Imagine a stand with a variety of product catalogs with a specific product category.

Demos:

  • Demo Watches
  • Demo Shoes
  • Demo Phones
  • Demo Sofas

Start using our product catalog plugin and explore all the features yourself. The zooming options, price,discount price parameters and comment blocks with many other features will make your online store look like a professional and advanced e-commerce website.

You have the possibility to add an unlimited number of products to your product catalog, and each item can be customized in detail to your preference. Collect all products in certain categories, which are product catalogs.

Product Catalog may also be customized according to your taste, to allow a detailed understanding of the product in the catalog. In addition, each product may be associated with the images as single and multiple.

Customers are provided with the ability to rate the product catalogs’ items, and write feedback about products shown in the catalog, as well as writing reviews which will show up for each product.

OriginCode Product Catalog license provides you with a high level of customization in relation to almost all aspects of the catalog: from the background color and size of the text inside the cell of the product to the number of products in the series and the number of comments on the product page.

Order of the products can be changed with easy drag & drop function.

In the admin page you can find custom fields containing certain product characteristics, such as price or color, moreover, you can add more fields.

The whole product catalog where all your products are collected, can be demonstrated with 5 beautiful views, they are:

  • Block Toggle Up-Down
  • Full-Height Blocks
  • Catalog Content Popup
  • Full-With Blocks
  • Content Slide

Choose a cover image and it’s done.

General Options for pro users you can find on the left panel under catalog plugin. There are:

Besides the basic Product Catalog Plugin we have an additional plugin to it, called Catalog Related Products.

Catalog Related Products plugin works only in addition to Product Catalog plugin, and will not work without it.

The plugin is made to bring all related products in the certain product page. For example: if you are interested in “watches” and have entered the page of your prefered watch, under it you will see other watches that are offered by the catalog.

Pro version of Catalog Related Products provides you with different customization on related products’ block. More detailed about the options you can learn from User Manual of Catalog Related Products plugin.

Product Catalog Admin Page Includes:

  • 1) Main image
  • 2) Additional images (thumbnails)
  • 3) Title
  • 4) Description
  • 5) Price
  • 6) Discount price
  • 7) Other parameters

General Options

General Options are free, you can make changes on changeable text on changeable text in different buttons/ More detailed information about the options you can find in User Manual

  • Submissions (Free)

This page for managing your submissions from users. When the user presses the “contact to seller” button and fills the form.

It includes:

    1. Customer Name
    1. Customer Message
    1. Customer Email
    1. Customer Phone

  • Product Name

  • Related Products ( works only with Product catalog Plugin)
    This tool helps you to demonstrate related products while choosing some category.
  • Ratings Manager: from here you can manage ratings
  • Review Manager: from here you can manage reviews

The Plugin includes two kinds of shortcodes. The short one is for posts pages, the longer one is php-shortcode for template, plugin also can be used as a widget. Simply copy/past the shortcode into your preferable location, or press the button and automatically add it from edit post/page section

5 Product Catalog Views

  • Block Toggle Up-Down

The compact solution for your shop page. The view will demonstrate the product catalog main image in similar boxes with title, and little arrow next to it, as you press the arrow opens vertical tape, which consists of additional images, description and other parameters about product, and “View Product” button. Pressing on that button you will get to the product catalog main page. All images open with Lightbox.

  • Full-Height Blocks

You definitely have seen e-commerce websites with such design. It opens vertical tape, with a large main image, additional images, text, information about product catalog and “View Product” button. Pressing on that button you will get to the product catalog main page. All images can be opened with Lightbox.

  • Catalog / Content Popup

In closed position it is fixed boxes with cover/mail image and title, as you click on image, opens popup with larger main and additional images in it, title, description and other information about the product next to it, so its gives fastness for your store as shop will not open new page but big popup with main information, also popup has “View Product” button. Pressing on that button you will get to the product catalog main page.

  • Full-With Blocks

Main image with tiny additional images under it, all of them can be opened with Lightbox. Next to the images you can find the title, description, product information and “View Product” button. Pressing on that button you will get to the product catalog main page.

  • Content Slider

Slider with the main image with tiny additional images under it, all of them can be opened with Lightbox. Next to the images you can find the title, description, product information and “View Product” button. Pressing on that button you will get to the product catalog main page. Slide the content manually by pressing on arrows. You also may use it in your shop with another view as a widget or advertisement for another category of store.

  • Unlimited Amount Of Product Catalogs and Item Listing

Add an unlimited number of products in a single catalog.And as you created a number of catalogs, you can add as many catalog shortcodes in your website, as you need.

  • Fully Responsive Product Catalog

Plugin is fully responsive for different sizes of screen. It means your users will see your products in the proper way using any device.

  • Portfolio Catalog Single product Page Option

Automatically generates a Single Product page for each product – on this page you can find detailed information of each product, including parameters, rating, share buttons and others.

  • Product Catalog Parameters and Comment Tabs

In each Product Page you can find the Parameters tab , next to its Comments tab. Your visitors can watch them in the most comfortable way using those tabs.

  • Product Catalog Image Zoom Option

Image zoom is a very necessary feature, with it you can zoom every pixel of the product image and see it’s details. This will help visitors to distinguish the bad and good product quality.

  • Image Lightbox Popup

Use the Lightbox option to show your images in full size. Whether it is on product lists or single product pages, activating the lightbox and images after click will be opened in a fancy popup with real (bigger) sizes.

  • Contact Seller Form

Customer decided to make a purchase or ask some question in the catalog, with a useful “Contact Seller” button he/she can fill the special form and submit the message.

  • Product Catalog Share and rating Option

Product Page has Share and Rating features, which allows your customers rate the product and share it on different social networks, rating can be also managed from “Rating Manager” section

  • User-Friendly Product Catalog Admin Panel

Admin panel is full of user-friendly features, from there you can choose catalog styles, add millions of parameters, change the order of the products and many-many other things that will make creating the product catalog process easy and enjoyable.
